Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ebehert
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

Allow extra travel time.
